name: Gen17 Beard Laperm Royalpurple
bio: What's up! I'm Gen17 Beard Laperm Royalpurple. I'm a Spin Instructor  by day, and I like talking about how much I lift by night. It wasn't heavily publicized, but I once had a brief relationship with Hobbes. Our friendship will be prickly, preposterous, and full of lasagna.
